attributes.action: Bring back the best boxing podcast of Bunceys espn boxing podcast back online.
attributes.additional_details:
sport fans can interact with and get close to there sporting heroes.
Some people look forward to an evening of listening to there favourite channel. Could be music, anything that we enjoy so why take it away.
attributes.background:
Buncey s espn boxing podcast was a great listener for thousands of boxing fans. 
The interviews with past and present boxers put there profiles out there and gave them the chance to interact with fans.
Boxers need to earn a living too. us as fans have had an enjoyable pastime again taken from us.

rejection.details:
This decision is not something for which the UK Government or Parliament is responsible. You might want to contact ESPN directly with your complaint:
http://submit.espn.co.uk/espn/sport/submit/forms/feedback.html
